title: Ask not what Brown can do for you, but what you can do for Brown - SOLD
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Ask not what Brown can do for you, but what you can do for Brown - SOLD
posts.post_content:
The Chicago Shirt variation in raw, unadulterated form is offered for sale.

A touch of paper loss near the top on the front is the flaw that would keep this from grading VG or VG/EX.  A very nice copy none the less features a Polar Bear back as well.  It's a tad off center probably due to his unbalanced hands.
The card has been SOLD.   Shipping is included in the purchase price.
